name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Natural gas ; Chamber furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 天然气1 ; 室燃炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Nitrogen oxidesdidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Nitrogen oxidesdidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本数据集描述了一种天然气驱动的燃烧室炉，用于产生蒸汽、热水或可能用于其他目的。该技术适用于所有规模的炉子，但未提供二氧化硫或氮氧化物的具体污染治理技术。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5446页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为天然气1，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the treatment technology for the pollution of Nitrogen oxidesdidn't offered
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the treatment technology for the pollution of Nitrogen oxidesdidn't offered
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is not described, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 0.02 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions after self-calculation according to the note. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术未说明，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 0.02S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for the pollutant indicator NOx is not described, and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, and the pollutant indicator as NOx, and the matching work has been carried out here to match the pollutant indicator to the flow that is most compatible with the LCAflow library, and the production coefficient of the pollutant indicator, which was described in the original document as NOx, is 6.97 (low-NOx combustion - a leading one in China).3 Please modify the corresponding emissions after calculating the emissions in accordance with the notes. Please modify the corresponding emissions after self-calculation..The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 6.97(低氮燃烧-国内领先)3。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 6.97(低氮燃烧-国内领先)3. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术未说明，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物原文描述的产污系数为 6.97(低氮燃烧-国内领先)3。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
